tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Leadership_Development_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    goal VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    objective VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    progress INT
);

CREATE TABLE Progress_Tracking (
	progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	plan_id INT,
	goal VARCHAR(255),
	progress_status VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES Leadership_Development_Plans(plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LeadershipDevelopmentPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Leadership_Development_Plans ( 
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    plan_title VARCHAR(255), 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE Employee_Progress ( 
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    goal_id INT, 
    progress_description TEXT, 
    progress_date DATE 
);
